ygData.from: Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4 <g4mntofcr@...>
ygData.subject: Whats your record?
ygData.msgSnippet: Last night in Karnor s my group pulled two drolvarg sentries so I tried to charm one.  I had nine missed notes in a row before I got charm to finally go off
ygData.messageBody:
Last night in Karnor's my group pulled two drolvarg sentries so I tried to
charm one. I had nine missed notes in a row before I got charm to finally
go off (which the mob promptly resisted). I've never had such bad luck with
missed notes in the past. Anyone had more than nine in a row before?

Galtin of E'ci


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
